Parameters: CharSequence: Title text to be shown
setTitle(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the title to be shown above the preference list

ClassDesc: This fragment provides a fully decorated leanback-style preference fragment, including a list background and header. The following sample code shows a simple leanback preference fragment that is populated from a resource. The resource it loads is: The fragment needs only to implement @B_android#support#v14#preference#PreferenceFragment#onCreatePreferences_E@ to populate the list of preference objects:
